about_the_game:
For centuries wanderers were traversing space an time to collect different rare artifacts, destroying dangerous ones and keeping helpful ones. One day a young man found mystical necklace and followed call of destiny…

Wanderer of Teandria is platformer where everything hides death. Bottomless pits, sharp traps, dangerous enemies, giant bosses and even platforms themselves will guide you trough dungeons, crypts, ruins and valleys of Teandria - mysterious kingdom, where everything is possible.

Key features:


  • Unique zones with dozens of levels
  • Gain new powers during your playthrough (for example, double jump or magic)
  • Defeat mighty bosses with help of your skill, tactic and reaction
  • Become the Wanderer and reveal your true destiny!

Wanderer of Teandria is challenging game with lots of secrets and bonuses. Search trough game levels, collect map fragments and open teleports to next areas. You have mysterious necklace that allows you open portals, but it will break with your deaths, so be careful and collect new crystals to succeed your mission.

Note: gamepad is strongly recommended
detailed_description:
CONTROLLER SUPPORT*

*Starting from September 5, 2023, Steam began to collect data on controller support in a new way. Since the game Wanderer of Teandria does only support DualSense/DualShock controllers via Steam Input System, the game description has changed. Wanderer of Teandria still fully supports most of the functions of Xbox and other controllers.
